V.ii.1.A.3.j
.
Evaluating STRs
Service treatment records (STRs) are generally highly probative, but not necessarily determinative, in the resolution of SC.Â  A current disability and, in some cases, a nexus between the current disability and an injury or disease shown in service will be required to award SC.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Principles of Reviewing and Weighing Evidence
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
